metadata.title: CVE-2023-29579 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** yasm 1.3.0.55.g101bc was discovered to contain a stackoverflow via the component yasm/yasm+0x43b466 in vsprintf. Note: This hasbeen disputed by third parties who argue this is a bug and not a securityissue because yasm is a standalone program not designed to run untrustedcode.

criterions.comment: yasm package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
